Method Detail

getDrawable

public Drawable getDrawable(int type,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int state)
The method provides single drawable of type.

Parameters:
type - ->XML_RES if you want dynamic resources and IMAGES_RES if you want to get real drawables .
name - -> name of drawable excluding prefix
state - -> state of Drawable STATE_NORMAL,STATE_PRESSED,STATE_DISSABLED
Returns:
Drawable

getSLTRDrawable

public StateListDrawable getSLTRDrawable(int type,
                                         java.lang.String name)
The method provides selector of given type.

Parameters:
type - ->XML_RES if you want dynamic resources and IMAGES_RES if you want to get real drawables .
name - -> name of drawable excluding prefix
Returns:
Selector
